message_1: Using the rail fence cipher, encrypt the message "HELLO WORLD" with a rail key of 3 and decode the result back to plain text.
message_2:
To encrypt the message "HELLO WORLD" using the rail fence cipher with a rail key of 3, we arrange the letters in a zigzag pattern with 3 rows:

H . . . O . . . R . . .
. E . L . W . L . D .
. . L . . . O . . . .

Now, we read the letters row by row to get the encrypted message:

HORELWLDLO

To decode the message back to plain text, we arrange the letters in the same zigzag pattern with 3 rows:

H . . . O . . . R . . .
. E . L . W . L . D .
. . L . . . O . . . .

Now, we read the letters in the zigzag pattern to get the original message:

HELLO WORLD
